item.title: Expiring Keys and Secrets within Azure Key Vault
item.description: I was working with a customer the other day and a fairly simple ask came up, I however could not find an immediate answer within the portal. How do I check for expiring keys within the Azure KeyVault? Now being a PowerShell person, I never gave this much thought as for most tasks or actions I perform on the Azure Platform is done through PowerShell, AP, or CLI. So easy enough, however, not everyone knows how to do this in PowerShell.
